articles.title: Google's new Search ads prove some things never go out of style
articles.author: Ubaid Zargar
articles.summary: Google launched an advertising campaign titled 'Just Ask Google' to promote its search engine. Simultaneously, Google introduced 'Search Live,' a conversational AI feature available within the Google app for users enrolled in the AI Mode experiment, transforming search into a flowing dialogue with advanced voice capabilities.

articles.title: Nang Delivery Launches Rapid Cream Charger Tank Delivery Service Across Melbourne
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Nang Delivery, an Australian company, is expanding its services with a premium same-day cream charger tank delivery. The delivery service operates late at night, 7 days a week, offering customers a fast, safe, and affordable way to get high-capacity cream charger tanks delivered to their door.

articles.title: LA's Acclaimed Egg Tuck to Crack Into San Diego's Breakfast Scene with New Little Italy Location
articles.author: Source
articles.summary: Egg Tuck is launching a new location in San Diego's Little Italy, offering its signature breakfast sandwiches and other menu items such as breakfast burritos, vegan options, and specialty drinks. The location will provide counter-service and takeout options to cater to the breakfast and lunch crowds.

articles.title: GPTBots Shines at Super AI: Empowering Enterprises to Meet the Next Wave of AI-Driven Transformation
articles.summary: GPTBots.ai was showcased at Super AI in Singapore as an enterprise AI platform. GPTBots enables AI agents to monitor client news for banking, automate customer service for consulting, and manage guest inquiries for hospitality. This platform aims to streamline operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive growth across various sectors.

articles.title: CYBER Express Wash Debuts in Alaska with a Bold Mission to Redefine Car Care -- and a Model Built to Scale
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Alaska
articles.summary: CYBER Express Wash launched its premiere location in Anchorage, Alaska, featuring a hospitality-first model and proprietary wash + express detail system. The CYBER model includes a 3-minute high-tech exterior wash, Alaska's only 10-minute express detail center, exclusive Graphene coating, and custom-engineered software, designed for precision, efficiency, and performance.

articles.title: LTIMindtree rolls out AI business unit
articles.summary: LTIMindtree has launched BlueVerse, a new AI ecosystem, to help enterprises accelerate their AI concept-to-value journey. BlueVerse includes a marketplace with over 300 industry-specific agents and the BlueVerse Foundry, a no-code designer for deploying AI tools and processes. At launch, BlueVerse offers pre-built solutions for Marketing Services and Contact Centre as a Service (CCaaS).

articles.title: 2025 Renault Duster: More rugged crossover SUV arrives in Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Two Duster models, Sandstone and Shadow Grey, underwent final evaluation and accessory tests. These evaluations occurred before the planned sale in July 2025. The tests provide clues to the final specification of local versions of the Duster.

articles.title: London's new Tesla service centre set to formally open its doors
articles.author: Jacob Reid
articles.summary: Tesla is formally celebrating the opening of its new service center, Tesla London Wonderland, in London, Ontario. The event includes showcasing vehicle models, demo drives, and a tour of the facility. The soft launch occurred in April, and the formal celebration includes live music, giveaways, refreshments and a Tesla light show.

articles.title: Inside the Google Marketing Live event – Google balancing privacy w/ an innovative toolkit
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Google introduced AI-powered advertising tools, including AI Max for Search campaigns, Performance Max (Pmax) for cross-channel campaigns, and Demand Gen for upper funnel awareness. These tools are designed to help marketers transition from responding to the market to predicting it, leveraging AI for improved performance and customer acquisition across various platforms like Search, YouTube, Display, Gmail, and Discover.

articles.title: Next shoppers rave about 'elegant' and 'expensive-feeling' linen dress
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next has launched a linen-blend halterneck dress, available in four shades (black, red, cream with blue florals, and tropical print) and sizes 6-26. The dress is priced between €43.50 and €62.50, with some customers praising its elegance and design.

articles.title: LG Electronics Career Talk Concert
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: LG Electronics is hosting a Career Talk Concert to connect professionals with opportunities in technology, electronics, and related fields. The concert will feature expert speakers, career guidance, networking, and insights into LG's culture, covering topics like business strategy, product development, and hiring processes. Attendees can explore career paths in engineering, marketing, sales, and finance and learn about internships.

articles.title: Zaxby's is opening new restaurants in the United States! Check out where
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Zaxby's is expanding its restaurant chain by opening over 50 new locations in 2025, with the next one scheduled to open in Phoenix, Arizona, in July. So far this year, Zaxby's has already opened 16 new restaurants in cities across the United States.

articles.title: I tested Yonanas' frozen dessert maker after seeing so many glowing reviews. Here's what I thought
articles.author: Rachel Dennis
articles.summary: Yonanas introduces the Classic Frozen Fruit Soft-Serve Maker, designed to transform frozen fruit into soft-serve-like treats. The appliance is easy to use, lightweight, and allows for various fruit combinations to create healthier desserts. The maker comes with a recipe book and can also be used to make desserts with cookies and other ingredients.

articles.title: Next's 'luxury Birthday' beauty box with £182 of OPI, Laura Mercier for £40
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Next is offering the "Luxury Birthday Beauty Box" for £40, which includes over £182 worth of products from brands like Tangle Teezer, Laura Mercier, and OPI. The set contains tester-size products and three full-sized items from OPI, Nudestix, and Tangle Teezer, making it a valuable gift or personal purchase.

articles.title: Y Combinator-backed Anglera debuts with AI solution for product data enrichment
articles.author: Nileena Sunil
articles.summary: Anglera, a Y Combinator-backed startup, launched its AI product data enrichment technology designed to transform messy product data into structured, searchable, and enriched content. The technology automates the transformation of various product data sources into complete product catalogs, optimized for AI discoverability. Customers like Jaapi, SecondShop, and Arbor have reported significant improvements in time-to-market and efficiency by using Anglera's service.

articles.title: Samsung Foldable: Next Month's Launch Expected!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone emphasizing a thinner design with a reported 4.5mm unfolded profile, titanium hinge components, and refined crease control. The Z Fold 7 is also expected to feature a significant camera upgrade, potentially boasting a 200MP sensor and AI-enhanced image processing, while being priced around $2,000.

articles.title: Samsung might launch its next foldable smartphone next month
articles.author: Andrew Sookdeo
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a thinner foldable smartphone, potentially in July. The phone features upgrades such as a thinner hinge, larger 200MP camera sensor, Snapdragon 8 Chipset, and AI-enhanced image processing, with an estimated price starting around $2,000.

articles.title: Carex Relaunched By PZ Cussons To Reinforce Germ Protection Mission
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Carex, relaunched in Nigeria by PZ Cussons, introduced its new Masterbrand identity and an expanded portfolio of antibacterial solutions. The refreshed range includes handwash, bar soaps, and antiseptic liquids designed for Nigerian families.

articles.title: Carex Relaunched By PZ Cussons To Reinforce Germ Protection Mission
articles.author: New Telegraph
org: National Association of Nigerian Nurses and Midwives
articles.summary: Carex, in partnership with PZ Cussons, has relaunched in Nigeria with a new masterbrand identity and an expanded portfolio of antibacterial solutions. The refreshed product range includes handwash, bar soaps, and antiseptic liquids, formulated to kill over one million germs in seconds while being gentle on the skin. This relaunch aims to provide a complete hygiene solution for Nigerian families.

articles.title: Google's Videos AI would be arriving at YouTube Shorts in a few months
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google is rolling out Google Lens integration in beta within YouTube Shorts. This integration allows viewers to easily identify items within the short videos, promising a more interactive and informative viewing experience. The rollout began this week.

articles.title: Lakeside Welcomes Louisiana's First Mango Store
articles.author: Site Staff
articles.summary: Mango, a fashion brand, has opened its first store in Louisiana at Lakeside Shopping Center. The store features the 'New Med' concept, emphasizing Mediterranean-inspired design with sustainable materials.

articles.title: 27 Affordable Lulus Dresses That'll Make You Twirl
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: The article describes various dress styles, including mini, midi, and maxi dresses, along with details on their design, available colors and sizes, and pricing. Each dress is designed to cater to a range of styles, from casual to formal wear, with the most up-to-date trends and modern takes on classics being featured.

articles.title: How much would you pay for a Chinese luxury car?
articles.author: Tim Nicholson
articles.summary: BYD is set to launch its luxury brand, Denza, in Australia by the end of 2025. The initial model is anticipated to be the Denza B5, potentially followed by other models, including the D9, N9 SUV, and Z9 GT shooting brake. Denza aims to offer a premium experience, differentiating itself from the mainstream BYD brand with dedicated showrooms.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Upgrade Now Makes Sense
articles.author: Forbes Tech
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing a new design technology that will significantly change the Fold 7 series. This involves redesigning components to incorporate Galaxy S25 hardware found in the Edge, indicating a substantial upgrade compared to previous iterations. The development of new processes and components is suggested to influence future products.

articles.title: Yep AI Launches 24/7 AI Sales Agent on Shopify App Store
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Yep AI launched its '24/7 AI sales agent plugin' on the Shopify App Store. This plugin is designed to deliver contextual, proactive engagement, helping merchants convert visitors instead of just answering questions.

articles.title: Magnolia Soap and Bath opening new Ocala store this week
articles.author: Jeremiah Delgado
articles.summary: Magnolia Soap and Bath Co. is opening a new franchise location in Ocala, Florida, on June 20, offering handcrafted and plant-based soap and bath products, including bar soaps, face scrubs, and bath bombs. The grand opening event will feature promotions such as five soaps for $25 and a free gift with a $75 purchase.

articles.title: The Coolest New Body Care for Sweltering Summer Days Ahead
articles.author: Jackie Fields
articles.summary: Olay introduces a multi-tasking body wash that hydrates the skin. e.l.f. SKIN promotes an SPF stick for sun protection. Voesh offers a heel balm designed to relieve dry and cracked feet.

articles.title: IPhone 16 Price Drop: Major New Offer
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Apple is offering a potential price drop on the iPhone 16, creating a new offer for consumers.

articles.title: Google launches voice-powered 'Search Live' as part of AI expansion
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: Google launched Search Live, a new voice-activated feature for its Google app on iOS and Android in the US, enabling conversational web searches. Powered by a customized Gemini AI model, Search Live allows users to speak directly to Google Search, ask follow-up questions, and receive spoken responses, offering a hands-free search experience.

articles.title: Target sells a coated canvas tote that's giving Goyard French girl vibes for only $30
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Target has introduced A New Day's Coated Canvas Tote Bag, available in stores and online for $30. This tote, offered in two neutral colors and an unstructured design, is being compared to Goyard's Saint Louis tote. A mini version is also available for $25.

articles.title: Next's £12 'lightweight' dress that's 'ideal for summer days'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering a lightweight 'throw-on mini Black T-Shirt dress' made from 100% cotton, available in seven colors for £12. Described as great for holidays and machine washable, it's praised for its versatility and style. New Look is also selling a Light Blue Broderie Anglaise V-Neck Midi Shirt Dress.

articles.title: WOO X introduces Light Mode for brighter crypto trading experience
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: WOO X, a crypto trading platform, launched Light Mode, a new feature providing traders with a brighter, more readable interface. This feature allows users to switch between light and dark modes, offering greater personalization. The new feature aims to increase trader comfort and engagement.

articles.title: William Thomas Digital Relaunches as WTD, Introducing a New Model for Customer Experience, names Emma Lyndon Managing Director and COO
articles.author: William Thomas Digital Inc
articles.summary: William Thomas Digital (WTD) has relaunched and introduced AgenticCX, a proprietary methodology for designing and delivering intelligent customer experience systems. AgenticCX combines AI agents, generative creative, martech, and data infrastructure to create adaptive customer experiences. WTD also offers Agentic Advantage, a two-phase accelerator to help marketers launch high-impact use cases.

articles.title: Wasabi launches brand new summer menu in all London branches
articles.author: Sophie England
articles.summary: Wasabi has launched a new "roll above the rest" omakase menu, available in stores across the UK, designed as a culinary journey with seven tasting elements. New products on the summer menu also include the jewelled donburi and a prawn crunch dragon roll. Wasabi rewards program members can earn double points on these new menu items throughout the summer.

articles.title: Popular sushi restaurant chain launches 'roll above the rest' summer menu
articles.author: Sophie England
articles.summary: Wasabi has launched its new "roll above the rest" omakase menu, featuring seven tasting elements including the Tuna Dragon Roll, fresh tuna and salmon nigiri, and spicy tuna inari pockets, available across the UK.  The summer menu also includes new products such as the jewelled donburi and prawn crunch dragon roll.

articles.title: Mininglamp Technology Launches AdEff Globally, Redefining Ad Testing with AI Agent
articles.author: Mininglamp Technology
articles.summary: Mininglamp Technology launched AdEff, an AI-powered global ad testing and optimization product, at the "Renewal Tour 2025" in Singapore. AdEff is developed on Mininglamp’s HMLLM and features a collaborative architecture combining LLM and MoE models, enabling it to predict consumer responses and provide ad optimization recommendations.

articles.title: As a Self-Proclaimed Sweaty Girl, I Never Leave the House Without These 10 Products
articles.author: Siena Gagliano
articles.summary: Lume addresses smell beyond armpits with a cult following, effective in blocking body odor. Megababe offers products that kick irritation and sweat, created by founder Katie Sturino. Nécessaire combines alpha hydroxy-acid with niacinamide and deodorant to combat odor.

articles.title: PZ Cussons relaunches Carex for war against germs
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: PZ Cussons relaunched Carex in Nigeria. Carex introduced a new Masterbrand identity. Carex expanded its portfolio of antibacterial solutions like hand wash, bar soaps, and antiseptic liquids.

articles.title: PZ Cussons relaunches Carex for war against germs
articles.author: Our Reporter
org: National Association of Nigerian Nurses and Midwives
articles.summary: PZ Cussons relaunched its Carex brand in Nigeria with a new Masterbrand identity and an expanded portfolio of antibacterial hand wash, bar soaps, and antiseptic liquids. The relaunched products are formulated to kill one million+ germs in seconds while being kind to the skin, aiming to provide a complete hygiene solution for Nigerian families.

articles.title: Clorox's Innovation Strategy Elevates Everyday Essentials
articles.author: Zacks Equity Research
articles.summary: Clorox has highlighted the success of premium products such as Scentiva disinfecting sprays, the upgraded ToiletWand and odor-control litter. Procter & Gamble improves its popular brands like Tide, Febreze and Mr. Clean by adding new features, better scents or easier packaging. Colgate regularly updates products with new scents, improved cleaning formulas and convenient packaging.

articles.title: Vacuum cleaner brands are starting to embrace a handy feature which I used to think it was pointless – but now I've changed my mind
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Shark is focusing on auto-empty docks for their cordless vacuums, specifically the Shark PowerDetect Cordless and Detect Pro Cordless. The Samsung Bespoke AI Jet Ultra includes an auto-empty dock as a standard feature, simplifying the emptying process.

articles.title: 'Spectacular for the price!': I tested the budget-friendly robot vacuum that rivals models twice the price - and it's 56% off right now
articles.author: DAILY MAIL REPORTER
articles.summary: The Lubluelu L15 Plus Robot Vacuum, available on AliExpress, is a two-in-one vacuum and mop robot. It is app-controlled and designed for effortless cleaning, featuring 5000PA suction, a 2L auto empty dock, and customizable cleaning options via a user-friendly app. The reviewer found it to be a valuable addition to their cleaning routine because of its quick mapping, effective cleaning, and convenience at a price of £132.19.

articles.title: Standard Motor Products, Inc. Opens National Distribution Center in Shawnee, Kansas
articles.author: Standard Motor Products
articles.summary: Standard Motor Products, Inc. opened a new national distribution center in Shawnee, Kansas on June 17, 2025. The new 575,000-square-foot facility was officially opened with a ribbon-cutting ceremony.

articles.title: Reviews Love This $10 Bottle-Emptying Kit
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Flip-it! is launching a 'Shark Tank'-approved adapter and dispenser system that stands bottles upside-down to ensure no product is wasted. It is available on Amazon for $9.59+ in multiple colors and pack sizes. The reusable and durable tops can be used all over the house for food, soap, lotions and more.

articles.title: LambdaTest Unveils Groundbreaking Mobile Accessibility Testing Capabilities for Android and iOS
articles.author: Lambda Test
articles.summary: LambdaTest launched its most comprehensive mobile accessibility testing capabilities, supporting both manual and automated accessibility testing on Android and iOS. These features empower QA, development, and product teams to identify, resolve, and prevent accessibility issues in mobile app development.

articles.title: Microsoft-AMD Partnership: Is Xbox Becoming a Gaming PC?
articles.author: Al Landes
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to launch a next-generation Xbox console, promising a significant technical leap. This initiative involves partnerships with companies like AMD and extends the Xbox ecosystem to handheld devices such as the Asus ROG Xbox Ally, aiming to provide gaming flexibility across various platforms.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Lidl to nab tower fan ‘just as good as Dyson'- it's perfect for hot weather and £200 cheaper
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Lidl introduced the Silvercrest tower fan for £69.99, a budget-friendly alternative to the Dyson Cool Tower fan. Other new Silvercrest products include an air fryer, a cordless vacuum, and Monsieur Cuisine Smart, drawing comparisons to more expensive brands like Ninja and Thermomix. These new items provide cost-effective alternatives in their respective categories.

articles.title: Five Nintendo Switch 2 settings to change as soon as you fire up your new console
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Nintendo released the Nintendo Switch 2 earlier this month. Users are highly satisfied with the new product.

articles.title: Amazon Eyes Bedrock Makeover Amid AI Wars
articles.author: Undercovered Deep Insights
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is overhauling its Bedrock AI cloud service with modular components to enhance runtime performance and cross-platform compatibility. This upgrade will allow customers to seamlessly run generative models hosted on rival clouds, such as OpenAI and Microsoft Azure, within Bedrock environments. The aim is to reduce vendor lock-in and speed up the production process.

articles.title: Infinix Unveils SMART 10 Series, Reimagining Everyday Smartphones with AI, Seamless Sharing, and Durable Design
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: Infinix has announced the global launch of its SMART 10 Series, featuring the SMART 10 Plus, SMART 10, and SMART 10 HD. The SMART 10 Plus boasts a 6000mAh battery, 120Hz display, and Unisoc T7250 processor, while the SMART 10 offers similar features with a focus on everyday performance and durability. The SMART 10 HD provides essential performance with a 90Hz display and 5000mAh battery, with prices starting at N95,800 for the SMART 10 HD, N102,000 for SMART 10 and N126,000 for SMART 10 PLUS.

articles.title: Embrace the cold this winter with Ninja Creami at its lowest price ever – now just AU$179
articles.author: Max Delaney
articles.summary: Ninja Creami, a stellar ice cream maker, is now available for AU$179 for eBay Plus members. The Creami transforms almost any liquid into creamy ice cream, making it appealing to those mindful of their diet by creating low-sugar, high-protein alternatives.

articles.title: Get a ‘fabulous' tan in minutes with this ‘fast-absorbing' tan accelerator
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Zhuzh! Tan Accelerator is being praised for speeding up the tanning process. The product boasts a hydrating formula with DHA to boost melanin, promising a natural tan in less time. Alternative tan accelerators mentioned are The Fox Tan Rapid Elixir, Ultrasun Megasize Body Tan Activator Spray SPF 50, and Tan Accelerating Lotion from Gatineau.

articles.title: GPTBots Shines at Super AI: Empowering Enterprises to Meet the Next Wave of AI-Driven Transformation
articles.summary: GPTBots.ai showcased its enterprise AI agent platform at Super AI Singapore, addressing the growing demand for adaptable and industry-specific AI solutions. The platform offers end-to-end AI services including customer service, knowledge search, data analysis, and lead generation. GPTBots aims to streamline operations, improve customer experiences, and drive growth for businesses.

articles.title: Blue Square X Expands to NYC with a New Hub for Immersive Innovation
articles.summary: Blue Square X is launching the NYC Experience Center on June 30, 2025, an interactive space showcasing large-format LED environments and bespoke 3D content. The Experience Center will host a grand opening event with demonstrations, tours, and panel discussions for developers, designers, and other professionals to explore innovative display solutions.

articles.title: How Ahmad Tea Is Bringing World-Class Tea To European Supermarkets
articles.summary: Ahmad Tea is expanding its product range with cold brew, functional, and wellness teas, as well as continuing sustainability efforts. The company is also launching a new online Tea Academy to educate consumers and drive in-store demand. These initiatives aim to bring premium tea experiences to more households and support retailers.

articles.title: Next shoppers feel 'elegant' in floaty £49 maxi dress
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next released a new linen-blend halterneck maxi dress priced at £49, available in four colors and sizes 6-26. New Look offers a green satin halterneck dress, and Nobody's Child has a Green Gingham Tiered Midi Dress.

articles.title: How to Choose a Good Camera Phone (Even If You Know Nothing About Cameras)
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: The article suggests specific camera phones like Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, iPhone 16 Pro Max, Pixel 9 Pro, OnePlus 13, Vivo T4X, and iQOO Z10x. These are presented as examples when discussing features of good camera phones, suggesting they are recent products or models to consider.

articles.title: 29 Products For Those Rare Deep-Cleaning Sessions
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Several new cleaning products are introduced, including Bioclean hard-water stain remover, Swiffer duster with an extended handle, and CLR calcium, lime, and rust remover. Bissell Little Green is introduced as effective item for couches, carpets, and other upholstery items.

articles.title: Supermodel Tyra Banks reveals why she moved to Australia as she launches upmarket ice cream ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Tyra Banks launched her first SMiZE & DREAM ice cream store in Sydney's Darling Harbour, Australia. The launch represents a significant milestone as her 'dream project'.

articles.title: 5 ignored features in washing machines that you must start using right away
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: Modern washing machines now include features like delay start, which allows users to schedule wash cycles, and a hard water wash option that softens water to reduce detergent residue. Some models also have built-in heaters to adjust water temperature for better stain removal and drum cleaning function to eliminate odors. Additionally, load optimization adjusts water and detergent usage based on load size, improving efficiency.

articles.title: Deadless Made Its Trade Show Debut at BevNET Live
articles.author: Deadless
articles.summary: Deadless, a woman-owned functional sparkling beverage brand, debuted at BevNET Live NYC. The brand, founded by Josie Deadless, aims to help others reclaim vitality. The product is a new sparkling beverage.

articles.title: Five Nintendo Switch 2 settings to change as soon as you fire up your new console
articles.author: Fionnuala Boyle
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to Nintendo Switch, has launched in the UK with prices starting at £395. It features upgraded graphics, boosted performance, and a bigger, brighter display. The new console is available for purchase, although pre-orders caused some retailers to sell out quickly.

articles.title: All the Best Early Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals
articles.author: Chinea Rodriguez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals including discounts on fashion items. Customers can save on brands like Hanes, Free People, Madewell, Mother, and Lioness through Shopbop on Amazon. These early deals include dresses, shoes, tops, pants, outerwear, accessories and underwear.

articles.title: Dates announced for Amazon Prime Day as event brings back spectacular offers
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day is returning, lasting 96 hours. It introduces 'Today's Big Deals', a page showcasing daily themes for Prime members. Amazon is offering deals on various products, including its Bladeless Personal Fan, Dreo 42 Inch Pilot Max Smart Tower Fan, Shark FlexBreeze Pro Mist Indoor & Outdoor Fan & Outdoor Misting System, Samsung's Galaxy A16 4G Android Smartphone, INIU 140W 27000mAh Portable Charger, Shark's Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner with Anti Hair Wrap, VAX's Pace Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Shark SpeedStyle Hair Dryer, and ghd Gold Hair Straightener & Styler.

articles.title: Trump Mobile's Long-Term Viability Questioned by Expert
articles.author: Theo Burman
articles.summary: The Trump Organization announced the launch of 'Trump Mobile,' featuring a gold 'T1' model smartphone priced at $499, expected to be available by September 2025 and a wireless network provider service at $47.45 a month. The smartphone is marketed as 'purely American-made' and is backed by 5G service. Experts suggest that the success of the phone will be based on the Trump brand affiliation.

articles.title: Primark shoppers 'obsessed' with 'insane' £26 dress that 'looks gorgeous on'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark is generating buzz with the launch of the Paula Echevarria Lola V-Neck Maxi Dress. The dress features an elegant V-neckline, ruffle cap sleeves, and is available in red, black, or green for £26. Shoppers can purchase it in stores or via Click and Collect.

articles.title: Best Digital Marketing Agency in USA – Boost Your Online Presence Today
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers offers a comprehensive suite of digital marketing services, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, content strategy, and conversion optimization. The company aims to help businesses achieve measurable growth by attracting, engaging, and converting their ideal audience through data-driven strategies.

articles.title: The Fact That These 33 Products Exists Proves Your Kinda Embarrassing Problems Are Totally Normal
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a neck and chest firming cream available for under $15. L'Oréal Paris introduced an anti-redness BB cream with a green tint. Laneige has released a Neo Blurring Powder for oily skin.

articles.title: The All-New Huggies AirSoft Pants Are Now 20% Off For A Limited Time Only
articles.author: Laila Zain
articles.summary: Huggies has launched the upgraded Huggies AirSoft Pants, designed for comfort with Super AiryZone ventilation and 360 Cloudsoft ultra-fine fibres. The new diapers are available in sizes M to XXL in major supermarkets and online stores, and there is a special TikTok Payday Sale with RM100 off vouchers from June 24-26.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Fold 7, Flip 7 may launch with free Google AI Pro access
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its next-generation foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, at the upcoming July Galaxy Unpacked event. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 could come with a free subscription to Google AI Pro (Gemini Advanced), providing access to tools such as Veo 3 Fast for video creation and Flow, an AI assistant designed to help with filmmaking tasks. Samsung also plans to upgrade its Galaxy AI capabilities at the event.

articles.title: Why I'm ditching the Steam Deck for the Nintendo Switch 2 for my next summer vacation
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 has launched, presenting itself as a portable gaming solution. Nintendo Switch 2 works well offline. The Nintendo Switch 2 is slimmer, lighter, has better battery life, and a higher refresh rate compared to other devices like Steam Deck OLED.

articles.title: The Trump Organization is selling a cellphone. Here are all the problems with it
articles.author: Jessica Roy
articles.summary: The Trump Organization announced the launch of a smartphone called 'T1 Phone' and a phone plan called '47 Plan' through a new business, T1 Mobile LLC. The 'T1 Phone' is available for pre-order and will be released in September 2025, while the '47 Plan' will cost $47.45 per month. The T1 Phone 8002 (gold version) computer-edited image on the preorder page does not depict a real phone that exists right now.

articles.title: Hisense Unveils 66 Core Patents for Triple-Drum Washers, Reshaping Global Laundry Innovation Landscape
articles.author: Hisense
articles.summary: Hisense has announced the worldwide release of patents for its triple-drum washing machines and launched the "Marshmallow Ultra Family Tub" series featuring the Zeus Intergrated Heat Pump Drying System. The new series is the world's first 4-in-1 heat pump washer-dryer that supports independent washing and drying and also has a split modular design which integrates with home aesthetics.

articles.title: AI image creation now live in WhatsApp
articles.author: Tarek Salame
articles.summary: OpenAI integrated image generation, powered by GPT-4o and DALL-E 3, into ChatGPT within WhatsApp, enabling users to create AI-generated images directly in chats from text prompts. Users can also upload photos and ask for edits or transformations. Linking a ChatGPT account unlocks more image generations.

articles.title: CLEAR premium water, steps into E-Commerce & Quick Commerce
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: CLEAR Premium Water has launched its bottled water product on major Indian e-commerce and quick-commerce platforms like Amazon, Swiggy Instamart, Blinkit, Zepto, Big Basket and Flipkart Minutes. This launch is part of CLEAR's omnichannel strategy to enhance consumer convenience and strengthen its digital presence.

articles.title: Xbox Gaming's Radical Future: New Era Unveiled!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is committed to a 'next-generation hardware lineup' for Xbox, encompassing consoles, PCs, handhelds, and accessories. Microsoft is integrating AMD's technology to co-engineer chipsets for upcoming Xbox Series X/S successors, promising enhanced visual quality and immersive gameplay driven by the power of AI. The company aims to make the 'Xbox experience' accessible across a multitude of devices, including PCs and handhelds.

articles.title: FOOTER sets new standards
articles.author: Faiqah Kamaruddin
articles.summary: FOOTER, a Taiwanese sock brand, launched in Malaysia with antibacterial technology addressing foot odour and sweat. In January 2024, Footer opened its first brick-and-mortar store to provide a tactile retail experience for consumers. The socks have limited-edition collections featuring key elements from the Harry Potter and Tom & Jerry franchises.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Toyota's BEV education initiative in Novi
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Toyota is educating consumers in Novi about battery-electric vehicles (BEVs). The automaker aims to address customer concerns through dealer education and public marketing activities. This initiative coincides with Toyota's plans to expand its electric vehicle offerings.

articles.title: This Bride Dyed Her Wedding Dress Pink—And Now You Can Too
articles.author: Emily Chan
articles.summary: The Own Studio is launching a new dyeing service named Own Again this month in partnership with Cavan Jayne. This service allows customers to re-dye their wedding dresses to promote re-wearability. The Own Studio uses natural materials to make the dyeing process easier.

articles.title: Weightless Shopping, Quite Literally: Enhancing Virtual Try-ons with Smart- Search and Style Recommendations by 'AI-Mode'.
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new AI mode to revolutionize the online shopping experience. This AI mode enhances virtual try-ons, personalizes search results based on style, color, and pattern preferences, and incorporates an 'Agentic Checkout' feature that tracks prices, preferred sizes, and budgets, completing purchases via Google Pay.

articles.title: Nisa Local new store officially opened in Stanford-le-Hope
articles.author: Sophie England
articles.summary: The Amipara family has opened a new Nisa Local store in Stanford-le-Hope, featuring a broad food-to-go range with Country Choice and Rollover hot dogs, and a value-driven grocery offer with Co-op own brand lines. The store will also provide Evri parcel delivery service.

articles.title: Primark shoppers 'speechless' after spotting 'insane' £26 dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark has introduced the Paula Echevarria Lola V-Neck Maxi Dress, priced at £26. This dress, available in red, black, or green, features a V-neckline and ruffle cap sleeves and is part of the Paula Echevarria range.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Fold 7, Flip 7 may launch with free Google AI Pro access - ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldable smartphones at the July Galaxy Unpacked event. Samsung has previewed the Z Fold 7.

articles.title: Dangbei N2 Mini review: A smart, travel-friendly projector that delivers big
articles.author: Noel Campion
articles.summary: Dangbei launched the N2 Mini Projector, a compact device featuring true 1080p picture, licensed Netflix, and an InstaPro AI image setup system. The projector is designed for portability and ease of use, offering native 1080p resolution and a built-in speaker with Dolby Audio support.

articles.title: eClerx Named a Major Contender in Everest Group's Marketing Services PEAK Matrix® 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: eClerx has been recognized as a Major Contender in Everest Group's Marketing Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The company's proprietary solutions, including Market360, FLUiiD4®, Roboworx, and Merchandiser+, amplify content output and streamline workflows. Their GenAI360 suite accelerates campaign planning and creative production.

articles.title: Want Amazon Prime Free for Prime Day? Metro by T-Mobile Has You Covered
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A new phone plan perk offers shoppers free access to Amazon Prime. This provides customers access to Amazon Prime deals.

articles.title: Samsung to launch 2025 foldable phones in July?
articles.author: Hania Jamil
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to be launching its 2025 foldable phone lineup, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip Z, and potentially the Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE, at an Unpacked event in July. Additionally, the Galaxy S22 series is receiving a software update that includes the June 2025 security patch and bug fixes for One UI 7.0.

articles.title: All the new treats hitting shelves including Pot Noodle and Digestives – but can YOU spot the difference?
articles.author: Lana Clements
articles.summary: McVitie's launched a limited-edition raspberry and cream flavor of Digestives. Jammie Dodgers introduced a Mango and Passionfruit flavor. Pot Noodle released a Flame Grilled Steak version. Jaffa Cakes revealed a Hot Honey flavor. New York Bakery expanded into subs with original, Italian style, and roasted onion flavors. Nescafe launched Aero Peppermint Mocha, Quality Street mocha flavor, and a vanilla cookie dough latte.

articles.title: PZ Cussons relaunches Carex with one mission: Win the War Against Germs
articles.summary: PZ Cussons has relaunched Carex in Nigeria. The relaunch features a new masterbrand identity. The company is introducing an expanded portfolio of antibacterial solutions, including handwash.

articles.title: When Maya met the machine: A story of AI, Intuition & Integrated campaigns
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: A global beauty brand launched a flagship product supported by 'The Machine,' an AI suite, to synthesize data and optimize campaign performance across multiple channels. The campaign used AI to personalize content and adapt to real-time feedback, enhancing consumer engagement and achieving significant results.

articles.title: Amazon announces new perk for millions but it's only available for 96 hours
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Amazon has announced the extension of its annual Prime Day sale to 96 hours, running from July 8-11, 2025. This year's event will introduce 'Today's Big Deals', featuring daily themes and limited-time 'New Deal Drop' deals for Prime members. Amazon also offers personalized deal recommendations through its AI shopping assistant, Rufus.

articles.title: Generatik Launches: The platform that promises to simplify indoor advertising. Campaigns can now be planned in 20 minutes
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Brand Management launched Generatik, a new digital platform designed to streamline offline advertising campaigns in physical spaces. Generatik aims to reduce planning time from 20 days to 20 minutes by integrating location selection, budgeting, booking, implementation, and monitoring. The platform targets companies with advertising budgets between €100,000 and €500,000 and is designed to simplify the entire advertising process for brands.

articles.title: REVIEW: All the best SMiZE & DREAM ice cream flavours ranked
articles.author: Celia Whitley
articles.summary: Tyra Banks launched her flagship SMiZE & DREAM ice cream shop in Sydney's Darling Harbour. The store features a variety of ice cream flavors and enthusiastic staff who perform chants. The ice cream shop is inspired by Tyra's relationship with her mother and their tradition of eating ice cream and dreaming together.

articles.title: The deliberately quirky DS No8 impressed me, both inside and out
articles.author: Rob Clymo
articles.summary: DS Automobiles introduces the DS No8, an SUV-coupe with a focus on innovation and comfort. The No8 features unusual interior materials, a coupe-style exterior, and is available in multiple configurations, including front-driven and all-wheel-drive options. It starts at £50,000 and offers features such as Active Scan Suspension and a high-end Focal sound system.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Discover Rhode Island's oldest ice cream shop
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Gray's Ice Cream, founded by Annie Gray in 1923, is celebrating over 100 years as the oldest ice cream shop in Rhode Island. The shop continues to serve classic flavors at its original Tiverton location.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 To Offer 7 Years Of Software Support, Co-Founder Akis Evangelidis Confirms
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Nothing is launching its new phone, the Nothing Phone 3, on July 1. The phone will feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, offer seven years of software support, and is expected to go on sale on Flipkart in India. It may have a unique transparent back panel and is expected to compete with Samsung and Apple.

articles.title: PyaraBaby Revolutionizes the Parenting Marketplace: Making Pre-loved and Unique Baby Products Accessible Across India
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: PyaraBaby, India's leading online marketplace for baby products, plans to expand its product range under the PyaraBaby brand. This expansion will include exclusive, thoughtfully designed baby essentials that combine functionality with cultural heritage, targeting Indians living abroad and the domestic market.

articles.title: Meghan Markle is the ‘master of spin' after reportedly releasing new products for her brand
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's lifestyle brand, 'As Ever,' is set to release new products. Columnist Angela Mollard highlights the need for increased product availability to demonstrate genuine business acumen.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 reveal date leaked
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: Samsung will hold its next Unpacked event on July 9 at 10AM EDT, likely in New York City, where they are expected to launch new foldables and the Galaxy Watch Ultra. The release of these new phones might be soon after the unveiling event ends, maybe later in next month.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's 'telling pivot' as latest email exposes major 'shift'
articles.author: Jasmine Carey
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, is launching its second batch of products on June 20th, following a successful initial launch in April. The launch will include existing products like preserves and flower sprinkles, as well as new "delicious surprises."

articles.title: iPhone 18 Air said to launch with a battery saving display: What this means
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Apple is rumored to be launching a new iPhone Air model. The anticipated iPhone Air will feature a battery-saving display, aimed at improving device efficiency.

articles.title: Redmi Pad 2 quick review: Big specs, small price tag
articles.summary: Redmi has launched the Redmi Pad 2, a budget tablet featuring an 11-inch 2.5K display with a 90Hz refresh rate, quad speakers tuned with Dolby Atmos, and a 9,000mAh battery. The tablet runs HyperOS 2.0 based on Android 15 and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G100. The Redmi Pad 2 starts at Rs 13,999.

articles.title: $10 million dream: how 30 investors plan to get Riverina rice on shelves
articles.author: Jac Marshall
articles.summary: A new brand of rice is launching in supermarkets across Australia. The rice originates from the Riverina region.

articles.title: Donald Trump wants to sell you a smartphone. What could go wrong?
articles.author: Stuff writer
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new phone service and the T1 smartphone. The service costs $47.45 per month, and the T1 smartphone is gold-colored.

articles.title: Thin, light and built to last: New era of Galaxy Z Series Samsung takes Galaxy Z Series to a new era
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has been refining its Galaxy Z series of foldable phones, starting with the original Galaxy Fold in 2019.  Each generation aims to be thinner, lighter, and more durable. The newest Galaxy Z series represents a milestone as the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable device from Samsung yet.

articles.title: Google is testing voice feature in search with AI Mode
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Google is testing Search Live, a new voice-input feature within the Google app's AI Mode, for Android and iOS users in the U.S. Search Live utilizes a custom version of the Gemini model and a query fan-out technique to provide audio responses and accessible links, with plans to integrate camera functionality for real-time visual input.

articles.title: Deadless Made Its Trade Show Debut at BevNET Live
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Deadless, a woman-owned functional sparkling beverage brand, launched its product line at BevNET Live NYC. The brand's initial product line includes flavors like Bloody Berry, Citrus Sinner, and Evil Island, each infused with adaptogens and nootropics. Deadless has secured distribution in over 50 specialty shops and independent retailers.

articles.title: Meta expands Advantage+ with Gen AI ad creativity tools for advertisers
articles.summary: Meta enhanced its Advantage+ advertising platform. The platform has new generative AI tools. These tools help advertisers create personalized, brand-consistent ads at scale.

articles.title: Reddit launches two AI advertising tools to usher in new era of community marketing
articles.summary: Reddit launched AI-powered tools at Cannes Lions 2025. These tools are designed to help brands leverage community conversations and real-time insights.

articles.title: WashTec AG in Focus as FTSE Companies Maintain Sectoral Momentum
articles.summary: WashTec AG is innovating its car wash solutions by developing eco-friendly systems with reduced water and chemical consumption. The company is also integrating smart digital features for contactless, data-supported customer experiences, which are applied to both new installations and retrofitted in existing infrastructures.

articles.title: Everything you need to feel your best, conveniently in one spot
articles.author: Briteway
articles.summary: The Tanning Station introduced a spray tan booth and a fully equipped nail salon. The Corner Newsstand was transformed into Trackside Coffee Bar, now offering specialty coffee and breakfast sandwiches. Brite-Way Laundromat also scheduled to install several new washers in the upcoming months.

articles.title: Summer's Hottest Phones: 5 Must-See Releases!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nothing is launching Nothing Phone 3 with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset and a potential dot-matrix-style LED system. Samsung is expected to release the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 with thinner designs and camera upgrades. Google's Pixel 10 lineup may include AI features like a 'Speak-to-tweak' photo editor.  Apple is rumored to launch the iPhone 17 Air with an ultra-thin design.

articles.title: Seth Meyers brutally roasts Trump Mobile and T1 smartphone
articles.author: Sam Haysom
articles.summary: The Trump family is launching Trump Mobile, a new cell phone company. They are also debuting the T1 smartphone, a gold-colored smartphone, priced at $499.

articles.title: Kia launches updated K5, K8 sedans with new feature-focused trim
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Kia Corp. launched updated versions of its product.

articles.title: Ovaltine Gives One-Year Supply to Grandma Paid with Expired Goods for Laundry Work
articles.author: Jay-r Santiago
articles.summary: Ovaltine PH gifted Lola Verginia a one-year supply of Ovaltine products after learning she was paid with expired food. The company personally delivered the Ovaltine gift packs to her.

articles.title: 37 Perfect Gifts For Book Lovers In Your Life
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article introduces a collection of new and unique products and services designed for book lovers. These include items like a personalized floral book stamp, a 3-in-1 convertible reading chair, a waterproof Kindle Paperwhite with extended battery life and warm light option, Novel Teas with punny quotes, a luxury bath pillow, and vintage-inspired bookshelf games. These products enhance the reading experience and cater to the comfort and aesthetic preferences of book enthusiasts.

articles.title: The Best Tempur-Pedic Mattress Alternatives, Tested By Editors
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nectar and Saatva are presented as offering high-quality memory foam mattress alternatives to Tempur-Pedic, featuring enhanced features. The article focuses on comparing options in the mattress market.

articles.title: Amazon Canada Prime Day sale starts July 8, early deals on now
articles.summary: Amazon Canada will launch its next Prime Day sale on July 8, 2025, lasting four days. Amazon Prime members can access deals across brands like Ninja, Philips, Levi's, Three Ships, Good to Go, All Natural Advice, and Kidamento. Special offers will be available starting June 17.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Could Have an Ace Up Its Sleeve With Its Rumored Version of ...
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo has released the Nintendo Switch 2. The new product is building an impressive lineup of third-party titles.

articles.title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Ads, Breaking Its ‘No Ads! No Games! No Gimmicks!' Pledge
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: WhatsApp is launching ads for the first time. The ads will be targeted business promotions and will appear inside the app's Updates tab.

articles.title: Study Shows LLM Conversion Rate Is 9x Better — AEO Is Coming
articles.author: Lutz Finger
articles.summary: The article discusses Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), which is a new playbook emerging for brands to become visible in Large Language Model (LLM) conversations.  The article indirectly talks about companies like GlaxoSmithKline winning contracts to have their products, such as isotonic drinks, included in recommendations by LLMs.

articles.title: Marketing clouds are now a big part of industry-specific IT services.
articles.author: Adrian Bridgwater
articles.summary: Salesforce's Marketing Cloud Next uses Agentforce to empower marketing teams with AI agents. SAP Emarsys integrates with SAP data models for aligned customer engagement. Tastewise provides a food and beverage data intelligence platform, used by Kraft-Heinz to anticipate consumer needs and deliver innovations.

articles.title: In A World Of AI, A Great Domain Means You're Building For Real
articles.author: Darpan Munjal
articles.summary: Atom.com evolved into a full brand platform including a marketplace and AI tools for startups. Following its rebranding from Squadhelp to Atom.com, the company experienced increased organic traffic, reduced CPCs, and greater customer trust. These changes are attributed to the new brand and the services associated with Atom.com.

articles.title: How Online Businesses Are Winning Customers With AI Agents In 2025
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: The article introduces AI agents like Juphy, Smartbot, Shopify Sidekick, and Phot.AI as tools for businesses to enhance e-commerce. These agents automate customer service, visual design, and personalize the shopping experience, ultimately aiming to improve customer satisfaction and streamline transactions.

articles.title: China's AI avatars drive new wave of livestreaming e-commerce
articles.author: Yang Chuanli
articles.summary: Johnsmith.ai launched its AI digital livestreaming service in 2022, featuring digital human hosts capable of interacting in real-time and performing product demonstrations. The company's technology is utilized by over 500 brands, including partnerships with e-commerce giants like JD.com and Taobao to enhance livestreaming e-commerce, leveraging Alibaba's Qwen large language models for text-based interactions.

articles.title: Trump launches mobile phone service and $499 smartphone
articles.author: Express News Service
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching Trump Mobile, a new mobile phone service and $499 smartphone called T1, set to launch in September. The mobile plan, called The 47 Plan, costs $47.45 per month and includes unlimited talk, text, and data, along with roadside assistance and telehealth services. The T1 smartphone features a gold-colored metal body, Android 15, a 6.8-inch AMOLED screen, 12 GB of RAM, and a 50-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: Adobe launches gen AI-powered multi-purpose editing app Firefly for phones
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Adobe launched a new service earlier this month. The product launch introduces the service.

articles.title: Why I'm using an Android phone with a 200MP lens instead of my $3,500 Sony camera
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Xiaomi 15 Ultra earlier this year. The new product features a new periscope lens and stacked camera setup.

articles.title: If You're Looking to Remodel Your Home, I Found This AI Tool Useful for Inspiration. ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: An unnamed company offers a new version of its home design service powered by AI. The AI suggests design options, including potentially unusual choices.

articles.title: ZTE showcases full-stack innovations at MWC Shanghai 2025, co-creating an era of AI for all
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: ZTE Corporation unveiled a full range of frontier innovations under the theme "Catalyzing Intelligent Innovation" at MWC Shanghai 2025. These innovations span AI + networks, AI applications, and AI-powered technology, ecosystem, and commercial deployment.

articles.title: Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine Launches Gen Z brand Sunnie
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Witherspoon unveiled a new multimedia product.

articles.title: Mr. Clean Power Washing, LLC Expands Services Amid Rising Demand for Commercial and Residential Cleaning
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Mr. Clean Power Washing, LLC is expanding its service offerings to better serve both commercial and residential clients. This expansion is a response to the rising demand and reflects broader industry trends, including technological advancements and eco-friendly practices.
